    public class EditAppointmentActivity
extends onDataPass
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener, SelectionListener
    Activity class for Editing the details of existing appointment.

    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called when the activity is starting. This is where most initialization done: calling setContentView(int) to inflate the activity's UI, using findViewById(int) to programmatically interact with widgets in the UI. It also initialize the appointment object extracted from the Appointment object selected in the ViewAppointmentActivity
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in onSaveInstanceState(Bundle). Otherwise it is null.
        See Also:
        Activity.onStart(), Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onPostCreate(android.os.Bundle)

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        Initialize the contents of the Activity's standard options menu
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        menu - the options menu in which the items are placed
        Returns:
        true for the menu to be displayed; if false is returned, the items will not be shown.
        See Also:
        Activity.onPrepareOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu), Activity.onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem)

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
        This hook is called whenever an item in options menu is selected.
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        item - the menu item that was selected.
        Returns:
        boolean value. Return false to allow normal menu processing to proceed, true to consume it here.
        See Also:
        Activity.onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu)

                           android.view.View view,
                           int position,
                           long id)
        Change the dropdownlist dynamically according to the user selection. This is the Callback method to be invoked when an item in this view has been selected.
        Specified by:
        onItemSelected in interface android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
        Parameters:
        parent - The AdapterView where the selection happened
        view - The view within the AdapterView that was clicked
        position - The position of the view in the adapter
        id - The row id of the item that is selected

      • onConfirmEdit

        public void onConfirmEdit(android.view.View view)
        Actions taken after confirming to edit an appointment. Date and Time validation is also done in this method, as an appointment can only be booked 1 day before the appointment time.
        Parameters:
        view -
